name: beckmannia syzigachne
description: A coarse annual or short-lived perennial grass, Beckmannia syzigachne prefers full sun and wet soils. It can be a good choice for stream-bank restoration.  This hardy cool-season grass can form bunches, spreading from short rhizomes.  American Slough Grass is an annual, it completes its life cycle during one season but will re-seed.This seed is sold as PLS (Pure Live Seed). For example, if you order 1 lb and the PLS is 80%, you receive 1.25 lbs of bulk seed.
